parsed.explanation:
1. Added missing closing </TITLE> tags where they were missing inside some <BIBL> elements to ensure proper XML structure.
2. Corrected mismatched closing tags such as <PRICE> instead of <PRIZE> to maintain tag consistency.
3. Moved <PRIZE> tags outside of <TITLE> elements where the prize was incorrectly nested inside the title.
4. Added missing closing </BIBL> tags to properly close bibliography entries.
5. Fixed some malformed Unicode escape sequences that appeared as corrupted characters.
6. Ensured all items follow a consistent pattern with properly nested tags for better XML validity and readability.
